Candidates

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.0.6″][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.0.6″][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.0.6″][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.3.2″ hover_enabled=”0″]

Scope of Opportunities

H.I.M. Recruiters is dedicated to placing outstanding and qualified Health Information Management professionals. Whether you are looking for a new job or want to advance in your current area of expertise, we can help you. Understanding your goals, values, and professional frustrations; will help us align you with your preferred path.  We will assist in navigating you towards employment with an organization(s) that reflects your needs.

Our specialties are:

CCS Inpatient/DRG Coders | CDI – Clinical Documentation Improvement | Coding Managers | Consultants (HIM) – All Types | CTR – Certified Tumor Registrar | Directors / Managers (HIM) | DRG Auditors | EHR Specialists | ICD – 10 | Transcription Management | Vendors / Sales

The Students & Recent Grads page contains useful information and tips that we have created especially for you.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.3.2″ background_color=”#82be5a” background_image=”https://www.himjobs.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/02/cta-bkgd.jpg” custom_padding=”0px||0px||false|false” global_module=”572″][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.0.6″][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.0.6″][et_pb_cta title=”Start Your Job Search” button_url=”https://www.himjobs.com/search-jobs/” button_text=”Search Jobs” _builder_version=”4.0.6″ background_enable_color=”off”]

View all of the HIM job opportunities available now.
